overview: Yana meets the Young Man and falls in love with him at the party. However, when returns home she confesses that does not remember his name. Girl does not dare to ask the Young Man what his name is. So for two months she tries in vain to find out his name in other ways. In the end, Yana has a nightmare and she still confesses to the whole guy. The young man replies that he also does not know the girl's name. For the first time after two months of relationship, young people have a full-fledged acquaintance.
title: The Unnamed Story
